sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import Title from '../components/Title' import { Dados } from '../components/Dados' function submitForm(event){ event.preventDefault() console.log(formValues) } const [formValues, setFormValues] = useState({ nome: '', telefone: '', endereco: '', dadoscartao: '', numerocartao:'', cvc: '' }); const handleInput = (event) => { const {name,value} = event.target; setFormValues({...formValues,[name]: value}) } function click( id, color) { let element = document.getElementById(id); if (element != null) { element.style.backgroundColor = active ? color : "#C4C4C4"; } } export const Cadastro = () => { return (
<Dados /> <form className='row p-3' onSubmit={submitForm}> <div className='col'> Dados Pessoais <br /> <input type="text" placeholder='Nome' name='nome' value={formValues.nome} onChange={handleInput} /> <br /> <input type="number" placeholder='Telefone' name='telefone' value={formValues.telefone} onChange={handleInput}/> <br /> <input type="text" placeholder='Endereço' name='endereco'value={formValues.endereco} onChange={handleInput} /> <br /><br /> Plano Escolhido <br /> {/* <button className="button__carrosel" onClick={(event) => click(id, acao, color)}> <div id={id} className="rectang"> {title} </div> </button> */} <button>PLUS</button> </div> <div className='col'> Dados do Cartão <br /> <input type="text" placeholder='Nome do cartão'name='dadoscartao'value={formValues.dadoscartao} onChange={handleInput} /> <br /> <input type="number" maxLength="20" pattern="[0-9]{20}" placeholder='Número do cartão' name='numerocartao'value={formValues.numerocartao} onChange={handleInput} /> <br /> <input type="password" maxLength="3" pattern="[0-9]{3}" placeholder='CVC' name='cvc'value={formValues.cvc} onChange={handleInput} /> </div> </form> <div> <button>ASSINAR</button> </div> </div> ) }
